name: Don't Eat Powerups
description:
An (un)traditional platformer, use the powerups to you (dis)advantage(?)

Controls:

Jump: Space (keyboard) / A button (xbox gamepad)

Hi-jump: Space+C (keyboard) / A+X (xbox gamepad)
